metadata.title: CVE-2021-36373 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description: When reading a specially crafted TAR archive an Apache Ant build can bemade to allocate large amounts of memory that finally leads to an out ofmemory error, even for small inputs. This can be used to disrupt buildsusing Apache Ant. Apache Ant prior to 1.9.16 and 1.10.11 were affected.

criterions.comment: ant package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
